channel.title: [RS2HD] Changing Client Sprite
channel.description:
Hi,
I've kinda got a problem, I want to change the sprite in my client. Where it says 'Runescape'. I see that Dragonkk has managed to do it on his 562 loading 641? Just wondering if any of you guys know how to do it. Post back of you do or pm me.

item.title: [RS2HD] Changing Client Sprite
item.dc:creator: @Microfire Microfire
item.description:
@Microfire wrote:

Hi,

I’ve kinda got a problem, I want to change the sprite in my client. Where it says ‘Runescape’.
I see that Dragonkk has managed to do it on his 562 loading 641?
Just wondering if any of you guys know how to do it.
Post back of you do or pm me.
